settings.enableAutoCompletions.markdownD: Enable automatic triggering of code suggestions. When enabled, actions such as pressing Enter or pausing will trigger code suggestions; if disabled, suggestions can be manually triggered using the shortcut key. [View Current Keybinding](command:workbench.action.openGlobalKeybindings?%5B%22tencentcloud.codingcopilot.completions.trigger%22%5D)
settings.submitMessageShortcut.Enter.des: Submit: Enter, New line: Ctrl/Cmd + Enter
settings.submitMessageShortcut.CtrlorCmd: Submit: Ctrl/Cmd + Enter, New line: Enter
settings.enableCompletionLanguage.markdo: Enable or disable automatic completion for specified languages
settings.generationPreference.intelligen: Intelligent Mode - generate the best completion based on you context
settings.generationPreference.oneLineMod: One Line Mode - only generate one line of code
settings.generationPreference.markdownDe:
You can generate preference by yourself. we set Intelligent Mode as default, which means that the plugin will intelligently generate the best completion based on you context, possibly by line or by block.

If you prefer to generate only by line, the plugin will generate one line of code at a time or complete the current line
Enable Automatically formats the code generated by inline chat
settings.enableInlineChatIDEShortcutsTip: Enable IDE inline chat shortcuts tip (with Add to Chat feature)
settings.toolbarOnSelection.markdownDesc: Show toolbar when text is selected
settings.enableWorkspaceRules.markdownDe: Automatically read smart rules from the .rules directory
settings.planModeFirst.markdownDescripti: Once enabled, Craft will first analyze the requirements and then proceed to code generation after confirmation.
settings.modelResponseLanguage.markdownD: Set the display language of the sidebar dialogue interface
settings.modelDocumentLanguage.markdownD: Set the language in which comments are generated

settings.git.commit.style.conv: Generating case according to Conventional Commits

settings.taskList.markdownDescription: Allow Agent to use Task lists to track progress on tasks.
settings.HTTPProxy.description: Works when HTTP Proxy Mode is manual(VSCode version 1.74 and above is available)
settings.endpoint.markdownDescription: Backend service endpoint. Once set, all requests will be sent to this address.
settings.selectedCompletionModel.markdow: The currently selected completion model ID. To select from a list of available models, use the __"Change Completion Model"__ command or open the model picker from the completions status bar menu. The value must be a valid model ID. An empty value indicates that the default model will be used.
shortcuts.title: Shortcuts
settings.autoRun.markdownDescription: When enabled, the model will automatically run commands without manual confirmation.
settings.autoModifyFile.markdownDescript: When enabled, the model will automatically modify files without manual intervention.

settings.autoRunMode.runEverything.label: Run Everything
settings.autoRunMode.markdownDescription: Choose how Agent runs tools like command execution, and file writes
